name: Planteroo 2
description:
A sequel to the mega-popular planteroo, with a whole of 2 downloads, is an endless runner

The green plate takes away 25 of your health

The yellow box takes away 50 of your health

The spikes will instantly kill you

if you happen to lose during the game, your score will not be counted towards your high score. There are sections which pop up every few obstacles which let you choose to go home, thus avoiding your inevitable demise and making your score actually count. If you choose not to go home and continue playing, you will also gain 5 health.

Controls:

Arrow keys to control the player

H to go home
